channel.title: Posts on beddari.codes
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on beddari.codes

item.title: #cfgmgmtcamp 2019 tuesday schedule tips
item.description: Depending on your interest and investments in the various local pubs and bars last night you might be a bit tired. Relax, there are no choices to be made until after the keynote so be early to secure your front row seat! 11:20 Terraboard by @raphink Oh Terraform, our favorite dull sharp knife! Raphael is excellent at solving hard code problems in infra management and you won’t go wrong listening to him!

item.title: #cfgmgmtcamp 2019 monday schedule tips
item.description: Originally cfgmgmtcamp was a single track conference and although aspects of that still remains in 2019 the organizers have taken a liberal approach to adding more tracks. This is awesome but it really makes it challenging to get an overview of what is happening. The amount of relevant content available is astounding and knowing that not all of them will be recorded leads to my first tip. Do not stay where you think you belong!
